We Are An Aspiring

Development Management Service Company,built with a main objective in mind, how to offer the most exceptional development experiences.

With our directed vision and commitment to the highest standards, we seek to venture into new perspectives and unleash the full potential of the Real Estate Industry to create trusted, fulfilling and sustainable opportunities from inception to operation with achieving the highest possible returns. Mawan aims to bring change into the Kingdom and satisfy the full range of our clients’ needs and preferences.

Mawan,

Development

Beyond Expectations

Our Vision

Making Mawan the developer of choice to invest, grow, prosper and manage life superbly.

Our Mission

Broadening the horizons of Real Estate Development by investing our resources and expertise to create countless developmental opportunities built to nurture the experience of our clients, while providing guidance to help them make the most successful choice in the real estate market.

Visionary, Committed, Lively, and Exceeding, That’s How We Describe Mawan.

Visionary

Mawan’s vision serves to put the client’s success first, as we foresee the maximum potential of each project through a realistic yet creative concepts that are convenient to the location and able to achieve projected returns.

Committed

With our extensive market experience, we are proud to be able to maintain our commitments by adhering to the highest quality and delivering projects in accordance with what was first envisioned.

Lively

We aim to craft smart and creative solutions to ensure the best opportunities, through adapting to vibrant and updated design approaches, as we are able to envision a suitable project direction from planning to delivering.

Exceeding

Throughout every new journey in Mawan, we pursue establishing mutual, successful relationships built on honesty, integrity, and deliberate action, as it is reflected in delivering outstanding outcomes to bring people’s dreams into life through fulfilling services and experiences that exceed expectations.
